info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:03PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Whiteside, southeastern Carroll and southern Stephenson Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1102 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairhaven, or 9 miles north of Morrison, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chadwick and Coleta around 1110 PM CDT. Lanark and Milledgeville around 1115 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
